64274.summary: Some customers in the Seafair area of Richmond are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
64274.title: July 19 - Richmond (Seafair) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Tech crews continue to work in the area to restore services. Thank you for your patience.
64262.summary: Some customers in the Timberlea area of Fort McMurray are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
64262.title: July 18 - Fort McMurray (Timberlea) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
